flawed_nl_solution:
The vacuum cleaner costs $120, so Daria needs 120 - 20 = $<<120-20=10>>10 more.
Daria will need 10 / 10 = <<10/10=1>>1 more weeks, to be able to buy the vacuum cleaner.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 10. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
